column4: SAP plays down margin fears  prioritizes growth: CFO
column5: WALLDORF  Germany Faster than expected growth in its cloud business has pressured margins at German business software company SAP   but for Chief Financial Officer Luka Mucic that's a good problem to have.
Oct 18 Tesla Inc on Thursday introduced a new $45 000 version of its Model 3 sedan on its website  launching the car as U.S. tax breaks for Tesla cars are about to decrease.

column4: Tesla launches new Model 3 with mid-range battery -Electrek
column5: Oct 18 Tesla Inc is launching a new version of its Model 3 sedan with a "mid-range" battery priced at $45 000  automotive news website Electrek reported https://electrek.co/2018/10/18/tesla-model-3-mid-range-battery-pricing-structure on Thursday. (Reporting by Uday Sampath in Bengaluru; Editing by Sandra Maler)

column4: Tesla secures Shanghai site for $2 billion China Gigafactory
column5: BEIJING Tesla Inc has signed an agreement with the Shanghai government for an 860 000 square meter plot of land to build its first overseas Gigafactory  the electric carmaker said in a Chinese social media post on Wednesday. | Video

column4: Micron to buy Intel's stake in joint venture IM Flash Technologies
column5: Micron Technology Inc  said on Thursday it planned to take full control of IM Flash Technologies joint venture with Intel Corp .

column4: UPDATE 1-Micron to buy Intel's stake in joint venture IM Flash Technologies
column5: Oct 18 Micron Technology Inc said on Thursday it planned to take full control of IM Flash Technologies joint venture with Intel Corp.

column4: Micron to buy Intel's stake in joint venture IM Flash Technologies
column5: Oct 18 Micron Technology Inc said on Thursday it would buy Intel Corp's non-controlling interest in their IM Flash Technologies joint venture for about $1.5 billion in cash.
